feed.title: Even more proposed BIP extensions to BIP 0070

entry.title: Even more proposed BIP extensions to BIP 0070
entry.summary: In an email thread on June 23, 2016, Pieter Todd and Peter Todd discussed the issue of editorial control in regards to assigning a BIP number and merging. Pieter Todd stated that some degree of editorial control is inevitable but should be restricted to objective processes rather than personal opinions. Peter Todd argued that rejecting BIP75 is something that should be done on ethical and strategic grounds but Pieter Todd disagreed with this reasoning and called it "utterly ridiculous."
